description: Master blueberry pie with this easy step-by-step. Bursting with sweet berry flavours, it's the only blueberry pie recipe you'll ever need.
name: Easy blueberry pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut remaining pastry sheet into 6 even strips. Arrange pastry strips in a lattice pattern over blueberry mixture. Combine yolk and cream in a small bowl, then brush over pastry. Sprinkle over demerara sugar, then bake for 1 hour or until golden. Stand for 10 minutes. Serve.

Cut remaining pastry sheet into 6 even strips. Arrange pastry strips in a lattice pattern over blueberry mixture. Combine yolk and cream in a small bowl, then brush over pastry. Sprinkle over demerara sugar, then bake for 1 hour or until golden. Stand for 10 minutes. Serve.
